title: FS/FT: Only Jack Barry remains!  SGC 70.  SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: Only Jack Barry remains!  SGC 70.  SOLD
posts.post_content:
Hey everyone.

Have some SGC graded commons available for trade or sale. Would be interested in any EPDGs you have in any condition or basic commons to upgrade my Set.

If buying, shipping is included and paypal friends is preferred as well as money order/cashiers check with shipment on receipt of payment. I will always listen to offers, especially if interested in more than 1, however anyone saying “I’ll take it” gets priority over negotiations.

Thanks for looking.

$SOLD Jack Barry SGC 70
$SOLD Charlie Starr SGC 60
$SOLD Boss Schmidt Portrait SGC 55
$SOLD Jack Hannifan SGC 55
$SOLD Monte Cross SGC 55
